column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////When we got to the restaurant
column2: we were told it would be a 45 minute wait. They said we could order the pizza ahead of time so we wouldn't have to wait. We thought to ourselves
column3: perfect! Boy were we wrong. The pizza was cold and there was no sauce on it. When we asked for more sauce
column4: the waitress said she would get us some. 20 minutes later
column5: she asked how everything was. We asked for the sauce again
column6: and she brought it 5 minutes later. Only got one refill for the hour we were there. Terrible service. I would never go back.
